title: Design a personalized news feed system
summary:
FEEDBACK : 
TC := THE CANDIDATE
TI := THE INTERVIEWER
( OVERALL ) TC thinks they performed 3 on 1-5 star scale
( POSITIVES ) WHAT DOES TC THINK THEY DID WELL ON ?
+ TC clarified the question strongly.
+ TC did well on sections before pipelines : fEng, dataEng
+ TC discussed several models and learning strategies : TTNN and MTDNN
( GROWTH AREAS ) WHERE DOES TC THINK THEY CAN GROW ON?
- TC can review pipelines/systems portions : data prediction and data generation. 
- TC can work on proactively drawing boxes-and-arrows.
- TC can study offline metrics.
transcript:
Case Study :
FEEDBACK :
TC := THE CANDIDATE
TI := THE INTERVIEWER ( OVERALL ) TC thinks they performed 3 on 1-5 star scale ( POSITIVES ) WHAT DOES TC THINK THEY DID WELL ON ? + TC clarified the question strongly. + TC did well on sections before pipelines : fEng, dataEng + TC discussed several models and learning strategies : TTNN and MTDNN ( GROWTH AREAS ) WHERE DOES TC THINK THEY CAN GROW ON? - TC can review pipelines/systems portions : data prediction and data generation. - TC can work on proactively drawing boxes-and-arrows. - TC can study offline metrics.
